content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Area (Position x=0-2, y=0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (0,0) with coal fuel, storing 35 iron plates
- Stone furnace at (2,0) with coal fuel, storing 37 iron plates

### Copper Smelting Area (Position x=4-6, y=4)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (4,4) with coal fuel, storing 22 copper plates
- Stone furnace at (6,4) with coal fuel, storing 23 copper plates

### Inserter Assembly Line (Position x=20-27, y=2.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (20.5, 2.5) containing 108 inserters
- Burner inserter at (21.5, 2.5) with coal fuel
- Assembling machine 1 at (23.5, 2.5) crafting inserters
- Burner inserter at (25.5, 2.5) with coal fuel
- Output wooden chest at (26.5, 2.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to 4.5, y=21-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) producing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-2.5, 24.0) with coal fuel, converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (4.5, 24.5) generating power
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam distribution
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Research Lab Network
Multiple labs spread across the map:
- Several labs with automation and logistic science packs
- Some labs currently unpowered
- Labs connected to electricity network ID 34668

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Ensure sufficient iron plates are available before attempting to craft electronic circuits
- Keep track of iron gear wheel inventory before attempting to insert into input chest
- Monitor coal levels to maintain continuous power generation

### Assembly Line Issues
- Assembler shows ingredient shortages - ensure all required components (iron plates, iron gear wheels, electronic circuits) are available before starting production
- Make sure input chest has complete sets of components before starting assembly

### Power System Management
- Maintain adequate coal supply in boiler to prevent power interruptions
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters to ensure continuous operation

### Inventory Management
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items into chests or machines
- Ensure required materials are crafted before attempting to use them in assembly
